title: Organic Market and Food
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Fusion, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic market and restaurant situated in front of the Hotel Marbella Club. One could get healthy, vegan food as well raw options. Offers a daily prepared salads bar. In-house bakery. Kitchen closes at 7pm. Pleasant, modern country-style decor.
streetAddress: Avda Bulevard Principe Alfonso de Hohenlohe, S/N, Centro Comercial Expo
